original_text: Hear ye the words of this covenant, and speak unto the men of Judah, and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem;
korean_text: 너희는 이 언약의 말을 듣고 유다인과 예루살렘 주민에게 말하라

sentences.original_text: Hear ye the words of this covenant,
and speak unto the men of Judah,
and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem;
